eeka kiyala ara pinsarayata amaruda kiyala balagena yanawa gaman kiwwa apita.man meka prinsipal nohoth (pina) mihihata kiyanawa kiwwa.hama badada dawasakama ape panthi raswimata pina enawa.ane jahutage karuma dawasak eda tharukaya iskole awith na.papadama nagitta gaman kiyapi mehema deyak karala kiyala nam ekkama ara serama issaraha kiwwa.pina ithin enawa balanna kiwwa.ane papadama awith mawa nagguwa udata.oya pina jahutawa hodata aduranawa.jahutage loku nandage hodama hithawathek.mawa dekapu pina aah man danna kollekne kiyala.dunna mata ithin hodata serama issaraha hod kane parawal hatharak.

nawa handunumpatha handunwa dimedi siya ananyathawayata sima panawe dayi muslim janathawage awadhanaya meya jathyanthara mattamin nirmanaya kirimata siya departhamenthuwa adahas kota athi bawa pawasana pudgalayan liyapadinchi kirime komasaris janaral aaremes sarath kumara, ee sandaha niladharin puhunu kirima danatamath aarambha kota thibena bawada bibisi sandeshayata kiya sitiyeya.eheth me karyayedi siya ananyathawayata sima panawe dayi muslim janathawage awadhanaya pala wi thibe.chayarupa ganimedi swakiya aagamika ananyathawaya thahawuru kerena his aawarana saha his wasum bhawithayata thahanchi pana wenu ath dayi owuhu saka pahala karathi.kese namuth ema sakasankawalata kisidu padanamak nomathi bawayi, pudgalayan liyapadinchi kirime komasaris janaral aaremes sarath kumara sandeshayata kiya sitiye.siya kriyadamaya sampurna jathyanthara pramithiyata anukulawa sidu kerennak bawada komasariswaraya pawasayi.sandeshaya wenuwen elmo pranandu kala wimasumak me.
